links.title: Microsoft fixes Notepad flaw that could trick users into clicking malicious Markdown links
links.description: Bad actors could use the flaw to remotely load and execute malicious files on a victim’s computers.

links.title: Europe’s $24 Trillion Breakup With Visa and Mastercard
links.description: A 130-million-user payment system backed by 16 major banks just launched to challenge Visa/mastercard
